page.title: 06Bridges around Fatfield.
page.content: {The Viaduct The Victoria viaduct is made of brick and is about 150 years old.We estimate that it is 30 metres high and 400 metres long.It has nine arches and was built to carry passenger trains. {Penshaw Bridge This bridge is often called Fatfield Bridge.It is made of strengthened steel and has big metal bolts to keep it together.It is the shape of half a circle. {Chatershaugh Bridge Chatershaugh Bridge is the highway bridge and is made of concrete.It is much newer than the previous two. {Footbridges A pedestrian bridge,also used for light traffic,is found on the Lambton estate.Other footbridges are numerous and cross the disused railway and the various major roads.
